typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as string,
		Title as string,
		Cost as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source2 derive(myhash = sha1(ID+Title+Cost)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 exists(DerivedColumn2@myhash == DerivedColumn1@myhash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['combofile.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		ID,
		Title,
		Cost
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> NewAndUpdated
